parameters.name: CredentialConfig
parameters.description:
**If you have no special requirements, leave this parameter empty.**

The authorization chain settings. For more information, see [Use authorization chains to access resources of other entities](~~465340~~).

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: The name of the project. You can obtain the name of the project from the response of the [CreateProject](~~478153~~) operation.

parameters.name: SourceURI
parameters.description:
The URI of the Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket in which you store the image.

Specify the value in the oss://${Bucket}/${Object} format. `${Bucket}` specifies the name of the OSS bucket that resides in the same region as the current project. `${Object}` specifies the complete path to the image file that has an extension.

parameters.name: Threshold
parameters.description: The threshold of the label confidence. Labels whose confidence is lower than the specified threshold are not returned in the response. Valid values: 0 to 1. If you leave this parameter empty, the algorithm provides a default threshold.
